txt.en: On the slope stands an evil-looking relic. As you examine the relic, you are suddenly held in the grasp of complicated sensations: feelings of sickness, anger, and fear rush through you, and just as it seems it must be too much, they pass. You are left feeling weak and weary, and the relic keeps its secrets to itself.
'I do not like this, [placeholder]. It is clearly a relic of evil, but what its purpose may be, I cannot fathom. Does its presence here signal some new danger to the Grey Company?'
'Does this artifact spell some new danger for the Grey Company?'
'Where did this relic come from, and for what purpose was it placed here?'
A strange relic has appeared in Thrór's Coomb, and the creatures of the area hesitate to stray too near it.
The Ranger Brungos has discovered an unsettling relic in Thrór's Coomb.
